RelatedSentence: PARIS ( AP ) - The French government is broadening its authority to intervene when foreign companies want to buy firms the state considers vital , including in the sectors of transport , health and communications .

The order released Thursday goes into effect immediately , potentially giving the Socialist government more leverage amid General Electric 's $ 17 billion for the power systems division of the French conglomerate Alstom , which makes power plant turbines and pioneered high speed TGV trains .
